SEARCH
Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.rest

Class ThemeResource

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.rest.ThemeResource
@Path("/api/theme") @Produces("application/json") public class ThemeResource extends Object
REST resource providing theme configuration for the application. Exposes endpoints to retrieve theme settings and perform a ping test.

  • Method Details

    • getTheme

      @GET public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getTheme()
      Returns the complete theme configuration including light and dark themes.
      Returns:
      HTTP response containing the theme configuration as JSON

    • ping

      @GET @Path("/ping") @Produces("text/plain") public String ping()
      Simple ping endpoint to check if the Theme resource is reachable.
      Returns:
      a plain text response confirming the service is alive
